c:capability.name: PetToken
c:capability.c:description: Model of a pet collar token for a controlling access to a smart pet door.

c:attribute.name: tokenNum
c:attribute.description: Holds the index of the pet token up to 5.

c:attribute.name: tokenId
c:attribute.description: Holds the ID of the access token assoctiated with the smart pet door.

c:attribute.name: paired
c:attribute.description: Is a token currently paired in this slot or not

c:attribute.name: petName
c:attribute.description: The name of the pet identified by this token.

c:attribute.name: lastAccessTime
c:attribute.description: Holds the timestamp of the last time this token was used to access the smart pet door.

c:attribute.name: lastAccessDirection
c:attribute.description: Identifies the direction of traffic, in or out, the last time the smart pet door was used by this pet.
